Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [Esus] Gracious and asto[E]unding [Esus] God’s love so conf[E]ounding appears to u[A]s [Amaj7] In a cleansing flow of[B(add4)] blood [Esus] The Son left throne and gl[E]ory [Esus] Bore the Father’s wrath and f[Esus]ury in our stea[A]d [Amaj7]And for the sins of all H[B(add4)]e bled
CHORUS: [A] Stand in awe and wo[B]rship [C#M]Raise a voice in [E]worship come ador[A]e The King of K[B]ings and Lord of L[Esus]ords [E] [Esus] [E]
VERSE 2: [Esus] Behold the Lamb in He[E]aven [Esus] He was dead but God ra[E]ised Him from the grav[A]e [Amaj7]For His arm is mighty t[B(add4)]o save [Esus] Now glorified and rei[E]gning [Esus]The keys of death and Ha[E]des in His han[A]d [Amaj7]All hail the Lord of ever[B(add4)]y man
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 gracious and astounding gods love so confounding appears to us in a cleansing flow of blood the son left throne and glory bore the fathers wrath and fury in our stead and for the sins of all he bled chorus stand in awe and worship raise a voice in worship come adore the king of kings and lord of lords verse 2 behold the lamb in heaven he was dead but god raised him from the grave for his arm is mighty to save now glorified and reigning the keys of death and hades in his hand all hail the lord of every man
